snippet: Colorado’s Jhoulys Chacin dropped a routine throw from the catcher in the second, allowing Juan Francisco to score the only run.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Atlanta Braves defeat Colorado Rockies, 1-0; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Colorado’s Jhoulys Chacin dropped a routine throw from the catcher in the second, allowing Juan Francisco to score the only run.

headline.seo: Braves Top Rockies, 1-0, Again as Pitcher Flubs Return Toss
headline.main: Braves Win as Pitcher Flubs a Return Toss
headline.print_headline: Braves Win as Pitcher Flubs a Return Toss
